tool_description:
This api takes in a url of an article and returns the text.

It can be useful for: 
- Text to speech from articles
- Running analysis on article text
- Displaying articles in your own format on a website
- Running analytics on articles in the same format
name: Wise_extraction
title: Wise_extraction

api_list.name: extract
api_list.description: Feed in an article url and get text :) try: https://www.yahoo.com/news/is-arizonas-kari-lake-the-most-dangerous-politician-in-america-090045758.html
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wise_extraction.p.rapidapi.com/extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wise_extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wise_extraction.p.rapidapi.com/extract"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wise_extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
